attributes.action: Scrap the Newly released 2012 olympics logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I looked in the paper today and saw the "logo" and thought it was a picture of some grafitti scrawled on a wall, to my shock/horror i read what it was. Some 12-15 hours later, i noticed it was vaugely based on the number 2012.  Bring back the olympics logo bearing the rings in colour and the ribbon which would return the appeal to the olympics and sport in general!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012-Emblem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
